OBJECTIVE
Consistently self-learning system, networking knowledge as well as management skills to
prepare myself to be an technical manager in a near future.
EDUCATION
Oct 2011 - May 2014
Posts and Telecommunications Institute of Technology
Major: Information technology
2008 - 2011
Korea - Viet Nam friendship information technology
Major: Network administrator
WORK EXPERIENCE
Apr 2017 - Present
Fimplus company - Fimplus.vn
SENIOR SYSTEM ENGINEER
- Building and management private cloud Openstack with
highly available for production.
- Building and management software defined storage Ceph
integrated with Openstack and configure data tiering for
different purposes.
- Managed dozens of large physical compute nodes, storage
nodes, CDN nodes, GPU nodes.
- Building and management object defined storage Ceph(S3-
like) for hundreds of terabytes of data.
- Managing switches with Cumulus network OS.
- Research open source technologies(Linux to rule them all)
and propose procurement of infrastructure equipment with
manager.
- Using Docker to build Openstack services.
- Building monitoring system to monitor physical server and
services with Prometheus, Nagios.
- Building log monitoring by using ELK, Filebeat.
- Configuring automation with Ansible.
Dec 2015 - Mar 2017
VNSO company - vnso.vn
TECHNICAL SUPPORT MANAGER
Manage, support and training technical support staff.
Managing the infrastructure including switches, servers:
+ Manage and configure layer 2 switch Cisco, Juniper.
+ Manage and configure EMC SAN switch and SAN storage
NETAPP.
+ Operating HP BladeSystem C7000.
Deploy and operation hosting plesk, cpanel.
Implement and manage OpenStack cloud systems.
Setup and developing systems for vnso.vn, id.vnso.vn
websites.
Setup and deploying  Elastix call center.
Deploy system monitoring service and monitor server. 
Deploy SMS gateway with gammu.
Deploy Zimbra mail system.
Deploy share files server cloud.vnso.vn
May 2015 - Nov 2015
Mat Bao company - mabao.net
IT SUPPORT
Troubleshoot and provide support for technical issues clients
are having with their hosting, servers, VPS.
Solve the problem about SSL configuration.
Troubleshoot, test, quality assurance of hosting hardware and
software.
System skills
- Good knowledge about TCP/IP protocol.
- Good knowledge about networking.
- Good knowledge of Linux. Daily use of Centos. Good
knowledge of configuration and optimization services Linux
such as Haproxy, Apache, Nginx, FTP server, databases... 
- Optimizing operating system and services performance,
guaranteed to operate stable and highly available web system
and MySQL database.
- Backup and restore system for VMware EXSI.
- Ability to configure and deploy security solution on Centos. 
- Knowledge of virtualization. Implement and deploying
OpenStack systems. 
- Knowledge of software defined storage. Implement and
deploying Ceph storage.
- Planning, design and implemented the fully open, highly
available and scalable Infrastructure-as-a-Service architecture
for serving both of enterprise applications, production and
development workloads.
- Ability to write scripts for automation systems in linux bash
shell
SKILLS AND HOBBIES SUMMARY
- Ability to build monitoring system with ELK, Prometheus.
- Understanding Python.
- Ability to build services with Docker.
- Knowledge of Docker Swarm, service auto discovery.
- Ability to configure switch Cumulus Network OS. 
- Understanding AWS services.
- Ability deploy and managing configuration file by Ansible.
Programming skills
- PHP/HTML/CSS.
- bash shell.
- Python.
Soft skills
- Project Management.
- Time management.
English
- Good working knowledge.
Interests
- Music.
- Reading book.
- Play badminton.
Pham Khanh Hoa
System manager of Fimplus company
Mobile: +84 905 789 886
